entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then rain. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Windy. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
